ewgraph 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

minimum error rate for given certainty

Source: R/ew_minmaxcumh_p.R
ew_mincumh_p.Rd

Returns the highest (possibly interpolated) error rate, p, for which the accumulation of the chance density, h, starting from the last element of g and going to the first element of g is >= cert.

Usage

ew_mincumh_p(g, cert = 0.95)

Arguments

g

An ewgraph.

cert

The certainty. Lies between 0 and 1.

Value

The minimum error rate of g, given certainty cert.

Examples

  S <- 1000
  g <- ew_from_vec(dbinom(30, 300, partition_0_1(S)))
  min_cumh_p <- ew_mincumh_p(g)
  print(min_cumh_p)
#> [1] 0.07552868
